cart.hotelName: Uday Samudra Leisure Beach Hotel & Spa
cart.hotelLocation: G V Raja Road Samudra Beach, Kovalam 695527 , kerala , India
cart.description: DS located at the famed beaches of Kovalam, just 15 meters from the sea, is an exclusive 5 Star leisure beach hotel& Spa - a destination by itself. The setting, facilities, people, spa, cuisine and its whole philosophy is dedicated to your personal wellness in a luxurious environment. Just by being at UDS-one of the finest hotels in Kovalam, your stresses start to flutter away; the landscaping has its own serenity, a harmony of a defined architecture, spacious lawns, blue water pools and soaring coconut grooves all set in four tranquil acres by the sea.

cart.hotelName: Ramada by Wyndham Udaipur Resort and Spa
cart.hotelLocation: Rampura Circle, Khodiyat Road, Udaipur 313001,  Jaipur , Rajastan , India
cart.description: Set Majestically the resort offers breathtaking views of the Monsoon Palace (Also known as Sajjangarh) as well as Lake Pichola. The resort has a tranquil, salubrious setting, wonderfully recreating the romance of the past and yet completely in keeping with the 21st century luxury, making it a Hotel that lends itself to discovery and continual surprise.

cart.hotelLocation: Bhawani Singh Road, Jaipur , Rajastan , 302005,  Jaipur , Rajastan , India
cart.description:
About Taj Hotels Resorts and Palaces: Established in 1901, Taj Hotels Resorts and Palaces is one of Asia's largest and finest group of hotels, comprising over 119 hotels in 61 locations across India with an additional 17 international hotels in the Maldives, Malaysia, UK, USA, Bhutan, Sri Lanka, Africa and the Middle East. From world-renowned landmarks to modern business hotels, idyllic beach resorts to authentic Grand Palaces, each Taj hotel offers an unrivalled fusion of warm Indian hospitality, world-class service and modern luxury. For over a century, The Taj Mahal Palace, Mumbai, the iconic flagship has set a benchmark for fine living with exquisite refinement, inventiveness and warmth. Taj Hotels Resorts and Palaces is part of the Tata Group, India's premier business house.
Read more

The Caravela Beach Resort is an independent ‘5-Star Deluxe’ beach resort comprising of 201 rooms, several of which have direct sea-views. (The Resort was previously affiliated with Renaissance Hotels for several years). The Caravela is designed by the world famous architects WATG (who also designed the Atlantis Resorts, Sun City, the Bellagio and Wynn in Las Vegas). The Resort is located on the powdery white sands of Varca Beach, South-Goa. The Caravela is a 45-minute car ride from Goa’s Dabolim Airport and is built on a 23-acre estate, with a large golf course and a 275-meter long beach-front.

Finding an ideal luxury resort in Srinagar does not have to be difficult. Welcome to Vivanta Dal View, a nice option for travelers like you. Given the close proximity of popular landmarks, such as Pari Mahal (1.5 mi) and Kathi Darwaza (2.6 mi), guests of Vivanta Dal View Srinagar can easily experience some of Srinagar's most well known attractions. You’ll enjoy relaxing rooms that offer a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a minibar, and you can stay connected during your stay as Vivanta Dal View Srinigar By Taj Hotel offers guests free internet access. The resort features room service, a concierge, and a rooftop terrace.

Built in 1903, The Taj Mahal Palace, Mumbai is India's first luxury hotel. Offering panoramic views of the Arabian Sea and the Gateway of India, the hotel is a city landmark. The hotel offers 285 rooms including 42 suites, each adorned with original paintings and period furniture that exude an aura of old-world charm and elegance. The restaurants at The Taj Mahal Palace, Mumbai offer distinctive dining experiences that cover the finest Indian and international cuisines - from casual, all-day eateries to Oriental, Japanese, Indian and Mediterranean fine dining.

About Taj Hotels Resorts and Palaces: Established in 1901, Taj Hotels Resorts and Palaces is one of Asia's largest and finest group of hotels, comprising over 119 hotels in 61 locations across India with an additional 17 international hotels in the Maldives, Malaysia, UK, USA, Bhutan, Sri Lanka, Africa and the Middle East. From world-renowned landmarks to modern business hotels, idyllic beach resorts to authentic Grand Palaces, each Taj hotel offers an unrivalled fusion of warm Indian hospitality, world-class service and modern luxury. For over a century, The Taj Mahal Palace, Mumbai, the iconic flagship has set a benchmark for fine living with exquisite refinement, inventiveness and warmth. Taj Hotels Resorts and Palaces is part of the Tata Group, India's premier business house.
Read more

cart.hotelLocation: Dando Road, North Goa, Arambol 403524,Goa, India
cart.description: If you wish to relax & rejuvenate at Best luxury Ayurveda & Yoga Retreat in Goa, Veda5 is ready to welcome you with luxurious stay, vegan meals, authentic Ayurveda therapies, yoga meditation sessions and warm Indian hospitality. Sprawling across 5 acres of lush greenery with a private lake, Veda5 Retreat is a perfect blend of Goa's traditional architecture with modern comforts. Explore wide range of Ayurvedic therapies, beauty treatments and Panchakarma under the supervision of expert Vaidyas

cart.hotelLocation: T C 34/757/3 Watts Lane Beach P.O. Shankumugham, Thiruvananthapuram (Trivandrum) 695007 , kerala ,  India
cart.description: We are a four star facility hotel with 45 luxurious rooms located very near to the domestic and international terminals of Trivandrum international airport. The renowned Shanghumugham beach is just 200 mtrs from the hotel. The hotel has got a beautiful pool, Ayurveda spa, heath club, restaurants, conference facility of various capacity and equipped with wi-fi Internet access. The location is highly accessible from the city. The hotel has got very calm and quiet atmosphere.

hotels.hotelLocation: T C 34/757/3 Watts Lane Beach P.O. Shankumugham, Thiruvananthapuram (Trivandrum) 695007 , kerala ,  India

hotels.hotelName: Amber Dale Luxury Hotel and Spa, Munnar
hotels.hotelLocation: KSEB Tunnel Road, Pallivasal, Munnar 685612 , kerala , India
hotels.description: Explore the perennial tales of the sun-kissed valley. Of dawns that paint the skies in amber hues, of breeze that unfurls the mist, of treetops that sway to the winds, of the verdant green that carpets the hillocks; discover the many kaleidoscopic stories that unfold before your eyes and soak in the untainted natural beauty of Munnar. Welcome to Amber Dale, a luxurious nature retreat set in the idyllic highlands of Munnar, for an unforgettable experience of the undulating expanse of mountains, sweeping meadows, meandering green hills and the cuddling fog. Treat yourself to the comforts and opulence of our hospitality and service across our 50 luxurious rooms

hotels.hotelLocation: Kannankara Post Thanneermukkam, West Kumarakam, Alappuzha 688527 , kerala , India
hotels.description: The World Backwaters is a business-friendly resort located in Thanneermukkom on the bank of Vembanad Lake strategically located near to Thanneermokkom bund, Kumarakom Bird Sanctuary, Kumarakom Boat Jetty, Vembanad Lake. Regional points of interest also include Alleppey beach museum, Ambalapuzha Sri Krishna temple, Vaikom Mahadeva temple and Thirunakkara Mahadeva temple. It offers a heaven of comfort and stylish ambience catalyzing ones stay in God’s Own Country. Facilities in the resort :Multi cuisine Restaurant, Banquet /Conference hall, Board room, Lake side infinity swimming pool, Lake side garden rooms, Fish pond & water Stream, Gym, Ayurveda Treatment center, Gift shop, Free parking, 24 hrs Front desk, daily Housekeeping in room, round the clock security service, Kids play area, Travel Desk, Soft bar in room, Wi , backwater cruise and cycling

hotels.hotelLocation: Valluvadi Rd, Kidanganad 673592 , kerala , India
hotels.description: If the bounties of nature is what you seek, Welcome to Sterling Wayanad — a resort that allows you to enjoy rare wilderness visuals, ginger fields, rice paddies and picturesque plantations in God’s Own Country. Inspired by the beautiful Muthanga Forest, Sterling Wayanad is the culmination of fine hospitality and natural bliss.

hotels.hotelLocation: Lake Pichola, Udaipur 313001,  Jaipur , Rajastan , India
hotels.description: The Leela Palace, Udaipur, with its breathtaking view of the Aravalli Mountains stands majestically in a natural setting on the banks of the Lake Pichola. The Leela Palace offers its discerning guests an opportunity to experience royal living of majestic times.Evoking a grandeur and opulence of a bygone era, all 80 rooms and suites overlook the tranquil waters of the lake. Heritage and Lake view rooms finely appointed with artifacts and furnishings representing the handicrafts of Rajasthan. The suites evoke a sense of architecture which includes the rich and natural detailing of traditional Indian palaces.

hotels.hotelLocation: Ajmer-Pushkar Road, Pushkar 305022,  Jaipur , Rajastan , India
hotels.description: Set against the breath-taking backdrop of the Aravalli Hills, Ananta Spa & Resort Pushkar creates a fairy-tale like experience by offering the best of five-star luxuries. From blossoming verdure to 52 contemporary cottages,24 sprawling rooms,15 tents and a Ananta Villa coupled with service excellence, the picturesque facade aesthetically captures the beauty of your sojourn. Spread across 9-acres of lush greenery, this luxury resort features: • Two eclectic dining outlets • State-of-the-art banquet facilities • A well-equipped recreational room • Special kids' activity area • Outdoor pool • A Superlative spa and fitness centre Ananta Spa & Resort Pushkar crafts a unique escape for leisure stays, destination weddings and corporate off-sites in the sacred city.

hotels.hotelName: Ramada by Wyndham Udaipur Resort and Spa
hotels.hotelLocation: Rampura Circle, Khodiyat Road, Udaipur 313001,  Jaipur , Rajastan , India
hotels.description: Set Majestically the resort offers breathtaking views of the Monsoon Palace (Also known as Sajjangarh) as well as Lake Pichola. hotels.hotelLocation: Delhi - Jaipur Expy, Jaipur 303101,  Jaipur , Rajastan , India
hotels.description: Creation of this palatial structure took us a full Six years and we opened our gates to receive our distinguished guests from October 20, 2006 onwards. The hotels exterior is reminiscent of the palaces of Rajasthan featuring huge frescoes hand carved meticulously in ‘pink sandstone’ and white marble. The hotel is dazzling white by day & turns sunset yellow by night with our illumination providing the guests a spectacular view from all angles. Adding to the hotels grandeur is the magnificent ‘atrium’ lobby which reveals sheer grandeur. The interiors are a fusion of the Victorian, Persian & Mughal architecture.

hotels.hotelLocation: Benaulim Beach Road South Goa, Benaulim 403716,Goa, India
hotels.description: Find the beauty of simplicity at Fairfield Goa Benaulim in South Goa, India. Our tropically inspired hotel is just minutes from the pure sands of Benaulim Beach. Here, a cool sea breeze flows gently through the lobby, where tropical plants and cascading water emulate the natural elements of Goa. A generous pool, terrace and lounge complete the seamless design at the center of the hotel. Take advantage of our gymnasium and spa to satisfy your need for your fitness routine and well-deserved relaxation. Or blend business with pleasure when you host your meeting in our versatile ballroom space with room for up to 300 attendees.

hotels.hotelLocation: Vainguinim Beach, Panjim 403004,Goa, India
hotels.description:
A few minutes from Panjim, past lush paths, and on Vainguinim beach, await intimate alcoves, overhanging balcãos, historic murals and a welcoming retreat which embodies the heart of Goa.

Nestled amid verdant 30 acres that fringes the pristine Vainguinim Beach, Taj Cidade de Goa Heritage, Goa lies adjacent to the contemporary Taj Cidade de Goa Horizon, Goa. Designed as a Portuguese hamlet with Mediterranean influence by world-renowned architect Charles Correa, our beach resort in Goa is a blend of luxury, warmth and the laid-back elegance of susegad.

hotels.hotelLocation: Varca Beach, Salcete, Varca 403721,Goa, India
hotels.description: The Caravela Beach Resort is an independent ‘5-Star Deluxe’ beach resort comprising of 201 rooms, several of which have direct sea-views. (The Resort was previously affiliated with Renaissance Hotels for several years). The Caravela is designed by the world famous architects WATG (who also designed the Atlantis Resorts, Sun City, the Bellagio and Wynn in Las Vegas). The Resort is located on the powdery white sands of Varca Beach, South-Goa. The Caravela is a 45-minute car ride from Goa’s Dabolim Airport and is built on a 23-acre estate, with a large golf course and a 275-meter long beach-front.

hotels.hotelName: Holiday Inn Resort Goa, An IHG Hotel
hotels.hotelLocation: Mobor Beach, Cavelossim 403731,Goa, India
hotels.description:
Holiday Inn Resort is located at Mobor Beach, Cavelossim, in South Goa, overlooking the Arabian Sea. This Mediterranean-inspired resort with its direct access to the beach is as enchanting as it is unique.

Situated 38km from Dabolim International Airport and 17km from Margao Railway Station, the resort is ideally located for a relaxing and fun filled Vacation in Goa. The resort offers spacious rooms with balconies that open up to majestic views of the Arabian Sea and landscaped gardens.

hotels.hotelLocation: Log Huts Area Road Old Manali, Manali 175131,himachal pradesh, India
hotels.description: The orchard green resort is beyond an address. It’s a curated experience for you to make your holidays memorable. Rooms, rooftop swimming pool, kids pool, banquet facilities, games room, multi-cuisine restaurants and amenities are added benefits; your moments with nature is what we offer to you as our specialty. Come-Experience Manali like never before!

hotels.hotelLocation: Hamta Road Prini Hills, Prini, Manali Tehsil 175131,himachal pradesh, India
hotels.description: The Whitestone Resorts & Cottages is a luxury mountain resort to holiday or vacation located in a beautiful mountainous area of manali. The extravagance of this luxury mountain resort in Manali is unique in every sense and cannot be experienced anywhere else in Manali. Situated amidst magnificent mountainfront gardens, the resort is located within the majestic Himalayan ranges of Manali in Prini, which is just 3 kms from Manali town on Hamta road. It offers a great combination of comfort, style and unique local flavour.

hotels.hotelName: Welcomhotel by ITC Hotels, Tavleen, Chail
hotels.hotelLocation: Bhalawag Forest, Kandaghat - Chail - Kufri Road Near Janedghat, Chail, Kandaghat Tehsil 173217,himachal pradesh, India
hotels.description: Located 45 km from Shimla, Chail is a secluded gem within Himachal Pradesh that is the perfect antidote to the hurried pace of city life. Amongst these breathtaking surroundings, perched on a lovely hillside, Welcomhotel Tavleen Chail casts a spell on the visitor even on the drive up to reach it. Spread over 6.5 acres of woodland and nestled amidst oak & pine forests, the resort offers glorious views of the Himalayan peaks, where the guests can enjoy dreamy landscapes. The beautifully appointed rooms and cottages, each with a private balcony, bring the guest closer to the great outdoors, while they immerse themselves in the songs of nature.

hotels.hotelLocation: Advanced Study Road, Shimla 171004,himachal pradesh, India
hotels.description: The hotel is located in Shimla, the gateway to the majestic Himalayas. Downtown Hotel with Colonial styling, 1 km from Shimla Station & 22 km from Jubalhatti-Shimla Airport. The Hotel is situated at the quite end of the famous Mall and is an ideal base from which to discover the unique beauty of the spectacular Himalayan ranges, Cedar forests and ancient monasteries.

hotels.hotelLocation: Village Shuru PO Prini Naggar-Manali Road, Shuru, Manali Tehsil 175131,himachal pradesh, India
hotels.description: An upscale homestay that offers individual rooms with attached balcony with scenic waterfall & view of mountains overlooking the apple orchards. We have curated the space to offer you modern amenities with the mix of contemporary & cottage style design to deliver utmost comfort during your stay. Common living & dining area alongside the fire place with views of mighty Himalaya’s and apple orchids is a place for travel enthusiast to meet & share their stories. Perfect place to relax, rejuvenate and recharge yourself before heading back to cities hustle. All our rooms have private balconies

hotels.hotelLocation: Survey no. 157/9 Village-Taraste Pitasai Kumbet Road, Post-Pitsai, Raigad 402111,maharashtra, India
hotels.description: A tapestry of woodlands, a haven for those seeking solace in nature. Redefine tranquillity as you awake each day amidst thick greenery, and views of the mountains and the valley on one side and the Arabian Sea on the other. The locale is rustic yet opulent, allowing you to wander around lush pathways through enchanting petting zoos, spa and more. Each accommodation is themed, where you are not just a guest but feel like a royal wanderer finding harmony in the forest and forging timeless memories. The natural habitat completely alters your emotions, where you are now an epitome of serenity, having created cherished moments with the animal kingdom. Scenic hiking trails help you give an ode to the grandeur of the forest. An adventure truly awaits amidst the sprawling landscape of Forest Hills.

hotels.hotelLocation: Pune Mumbai Road, Khandala, Lonavala 410301,maharashtra, India
hotels.description: The Dukes Retreat at Khandala is not more than a 15 minute picturesque drive away from Lonavala. The resort is a landmark located 1850 ft. above sea level. The Dukes is spread across 11 acres of beautifully landscaped gardens, valley-view and the mesmerising Western Ghats. The property benefits from being set in the lap of the flora of the region and nestles amidst waterfalls, nature trails and winding forest paths.

hotels.hotelLocation: Apollo Bunder Road, Mumbai 400001,maharashtra, India
hotels.description: Built in 1903, The Taj Mahal Palace, Mumbai is India's first luxury hotel. Offering panoramic views of the Arabian Sea and the Gateway of India, the hotel is a city landmark. The hotel offers 285 rooms including 42 suites, each adorned with original paintings and period furniture that exude an aura of old-world charm and elegance. The restaurants at The Taj Mahal Palace, Mumbai offer distinctive dining experiences that cover the finest Indian and international cuisines - from casual, all-day eateries to Oriental, Japanese, Indian and Mediterranean fine dining.

hotels.hotelLocation: Lonavala Near Shirota Lake Kunegaon, Lonavala 410401,maharashtra, India
hotels.description: D.A.T.A. Resort is India’s first military-themed glamping resort offering a curated experience like no other, consisting of fun and adventurous activities in a controlled and safe environment, combined with uber luxury and amenities for both families and corporates. Check into D.A.T.A. Resort to experience a luxurious escapade nestled in the hills of Lonavala. Make timeless memories with your loved ones with our various packages for families or lead your team to the path of success with our unique corporate programs.

hotels.hotelLocation: Sahar Airport Road Near Mumbai International Airport, Mumbai 400059,maharashtra, India
hotels.description: Within the bustling heart of India’s commercial and entertainment mecca lays one of the finest luxury hotels in Mumbai. Nestled within the tranquillity of 11 acres of lush landscaped gardens and cascading waterfalls, The Leela Mumbai is a shimmering beacon amongst Mumbai hotels.Only five minutes away from Chatrapati Shivaji International Airport and 15 minutes from Mumbai’s domestic airport, the Leela Mumbai is well equipped with world class facilities and warm, friendly service providing the ideal gateway from which to explore northern Mumbai’s commercial hub.

hotels.hotelLocation: Katra Railway Station Road RLDA Plot, Katra 182301,jammu and kashmir, India
hotels.description: Holiday Inn Katra Vaishno Devi is minutes away from Katra Vaishno Devi Railway Station, Jammu and Kashmir and offers captivating views of the Trikuta Mountains and the celestial abode of the holy shrine of Vaishno Devi. It is just 3.5 kms away from Ban Ganga, the point from where the yatra commences and in close proximity to the helipad, making it a perfect destination for the pilgrims. The closest airport is 50 kms from the hotel. In addition to spiritual enrichment, guests can also explore the region’s picturesque tourist attractions, such as Baba Dhansar, Sihad Baba waterfall, Kotli Jhajjar, Devi Pindi Mata Mandir trek

hotels.hotelLocation: Buchwara, Old Gagribal Road , Dalgate, Srinagar 190001,jammu and kashmir, India
hotels.description: Hotel Snow Land is 4 Star plus Property Located in the heart of the city of Kashmir. It's just 300 meters away from Dal Lake. We offer a collection of two unique luxury properties located in Srinagar & Sonmarg. Each of our hotels is imbued with a rich history, brought bang up to date with a modern aesthetic and eco-minded approach. Snowland is a long time favorite for celebrity getaways. May we extent our most cordial welcome and sincere wishes for a pleasant stay while you are with us. We will try our best to keep comfort, convenience and class in every sector of service of Snow land Hotels and Resorts.

hotels.hotelLocation: Kralsangri Brein, Srinagar 191121,jammu and kashmir, India
hotels.description: Finding an ideal luxury resort in Srinagar does not have to be difficult. Welcome to Vivanta Dal View, a nice option for travelers like you. Given the close proximity of popular landmarks, such as Pari Mahal (1.5 mi) and Kathi Darwaza (2.6 mi), guests of Vivanta Dal View Srinagar can easily experience some of Srinagar's most well known attractions. The resort features room service, a concierge, and a rooftop terrace.

hotels.hotelLocation: Adj. Golf Course KP Road, Pahalgam 192126,jammu and kashmir, India
hotels.description: Nestled away in the beautiful valley of Pahalgam and blessed with uninterrupted views of the mountains and lush green valleys, the Radisson Golf Resort Pahalgam welcomes you to a nature lover's paradise. The resort is situated adjacent to the 18-hole Pahalgam Golf Course, one of the most prominent golf destinations in Kashmir, and enjoys the nearby presence of the gurgling Lidder River.

hotels.hotelLocation: Aru Road, Pahalgam 192126,jammu and kashmir, India
hotels.description: Located on the banks of river Lidder, Hotel Heevan Pahalgam provides you the right ambiance to spend your holiday in the "Valley of Shepherds." It has 45 centrally heated rooms, each with an attached bath and shower, EPABX Facility, color TV with in-house movies, telephone, channel music and radio. There is a round-the-clock room and laundry service. You can enjoy Continental, Indian, Gujrati and Chinese cuisine at "Dilkusha," our in-house restaurant or simply relax with a cup of tea or coffee at "Aabshar," our in-house coffee shop. The Hotel has a conference and Banquet Hall and indoor games

fakeTourData.description: Explore the vibrant culture and rich history of Delhi. Stay in a luxurious hotel with all amenities.

Experience tranquility with beach yoga in the serene surroundings of Kovalam, Kerala. Refresh your mind and body.
Embark on a royal adventure with horseback riding in the historic city of Jaipur. Discover the majestic landscapes.

Dive into the vibrant underwater world of Andaman with an exciting scuba diving experience. Witness marine wonders.
Immerse yourself in the rich cultural heritage of Varanasi with a guided cultural walk along the ghats and narrow lanes.
